content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 27, "index": 19}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 31, "index": 20}, {"type": "pufferfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_carrot", "quantity": 58, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_sapling", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "mule_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 43}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I need to first craft wheat, which requires a hay_block. Therefore I will move the hay_block from slot 45 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 27, "index": 19}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 31, "index": 20}, {"type": "pufferfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_carrot", "quantity": 58, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_sapling", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "mule_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 43}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I have crafted wheat. Now I need to move it out of the crafting grid so that I can craft the cookie. I will move it to slot 11 because that is a free slot in my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 27, "index": 19}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 31, "index": 20}, {"type": "pufferfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_carrot", "quantity": 58, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_sapling", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "mule_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 43}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To make a cookie, I need to place wheat, cocoa beans and more wheat in a row. I have 9 wheat, so I will start by moving 1 wheat from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 27, "index": 19}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 31, "index": 20}, {"type": "pufferfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherite_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "golden_carrot", "quantity": 58, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_sapling", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "mule_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 43}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
